ResourceHeader.ResourceName: MESSENGER MAG Cruise Phase Data, Resolutions up to 20Hz
ResourceHeader.Description: This MESSENGER/MAG data set contains cruise-phase magnetic field vectors in RTN coordinates at time resolutions typically of 0.5s or 1.0s and sometimes as fine as 0.05s.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Acknowledge the Experiment Scientist, Brian Anderson of JHU_APL, and the organization from which the data were acquired.

AccessURL.Name: FTP access to files at SPDF
AccessURL.Description: In CDF via ftp from CDAWeb

AccessURL.Name: HTTP access to files at SPDF
AccessURL.Description: In CDF via http from CDAWeb

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the CDAWeb team at GSFC/SPDF.

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb
AccessURL.Description: Access to MESSENGER interplanetary magnetic field data with subset, plot, list functionalities from CDAWeb

AccessURL.Name: PDS_PPI
AccessURL.Description: Access to data and documentation; note "amp;" needs to be deleted if you try to cut/paste/use this URL.

NumericalData.Caveats: See the Information URL given above for intervals more likely to have data quality issues.
